title: Cool to Cook
shortDescription: The only smart countertop appliance that automatically refrigerates then cooks your food.

title: Frozen to Cook
shortDescription: With a fast cooking speed and radiating heat element, go from frozen to fully cooked in 20 minutes.

title: Sous-vide
shortDescription: Water-based cooking allows you to perfectly cook proteins at a low temp for a long duration of time.

title: Slow Cook
shortDescription: Create perfect braises with this low, slow, and hands-off cooking method.

title: Roast
shortDescription: High temperature roasting is ideal for crispy vegetables and beautifully cooked chicken, fish, or pork.

title: Bake
shortDescription: This new cook mode allows you to bake up to 450F.

title: Broil
shortDescription: The upgraded broil function let's you add a gorgeous finish to your meal.

title: Steam
shortDescription: Gently cook fish, prepare nutrition-packed vegetables without oil, or steam your favorite dumplings.

title: Egg Cooker
shortDescription: With the optional egg tray, you can cook egg-based meals with all your favorite mix-ins.

title: Pasta Cooker
shortDescription: Automatically pre-heat, fill, cook, and drain your pasta to al dente perfection.

title: Rice Cooker
shortDescription: You can use white, brown, short, or long grain rice; water is automatically added and cooks to ideal tenderness.

title: Reheat
shortDescription: When you just need to warm your meal up, Suvie is ready to reheat your already cooked food.

title: Coffee
shortDescription: You can use the Suvie Starch Cooker to brew your favorite coffee; saving you even more countertop space.

title: Defrost
shortDescription: Suvie's cooling technology also allows for rapid defrost.

title: Healthy Grains
shortDescription: Couscous, quinoa, and other healthy grains can all be prepared in the Suvie Starch Cooker.
